title: Phantom dancer is ESSENTIAL on the new Fiora
body: The minion block is too much atm, your cant use your ult in lane without taking serious damage because she auto paths around minions that are blatantly no where near in her way and this takes soooo much time..

replies.body: That's like claiming PD is essential on any melee champ. You have the ability to path around minions manually, use it (just click multiple times for short distances instead of clicking behind the minions). Of course, once you're in range you can just use your Q to close the rest of the distance.
